A C G I L N P R S U

A

addNews() - Method in class News
addNews is called once a request has been sent, with a given file name.
addNewsToCategory(int, String) - Method in class Category
addNewsToCategory will save the updated news list under the specified category.
addNewsToFile(Element) - Method in class NewsStorage
addNewsToFile is a simulated process for adding the newly pulled news to the database file.
addNewsToLocation(int, String) - Method in class Location
addNewsToLocation will save the updated news list under the specified location.
addSource(String, String) - Method in class Source
addSource method is used to add a new source to the database.

G

getCategoryCount() - Method in class Category
getCategoryCount will return the count of different categories in the database.
getContent(int) - Method in class NewsStorage
getContent will return the content of the given news.
getCurrentID() - Method in class NewsStorage
getCurrentID will return the current count of the news that is in the database.
getDislike(int) - Method in class Rating
getDislike is used to get the count of the "dislike" given a specified news id.
getLike(int) - Method in class Rating
getLike is used to get the count of the "like" given a specified news id.
getLocationCount() - Method in class Location
getLocationCount will return the count of different locations in the database.
getNewsFromCategory(String) - Method in class Category
getNewsFromCategory will generate an ArrayList of news IDs of the given category name.
getNewsFromLocation(String) - Method in class Location
getNewsFromLocation will generate an ArrayList of news IDs of the given location name.
getSourceCount() - Method in class Source
getSourceCount is used to get the current number of sources that is in the database.
getSourceLink(int) - Method in class Source
getSourceLink is a method for extracting the http address of the source based on the source id(starts from 1).
getSourceName(int) - Method in class Source
getSourceName is a method for extracting the name of the source based on the source id(starts from 1).
getTime(int) - Method in class NewsStorage
getTime will return a formatted time when the expected news happened.
getTitle(int) - Method in class NewsStorage
getTitle will return the title of the specified news.

incrementLike will increment the count of "like" once called.
